m_szDocTitle: Patent US5690702 - Method of making electroactive high storage capacity polycarbon-sulfide ... - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: What is claimed is: 1. A method of forming a composite cathode which comprises: coating an electrically conducting cathode substrate with a mixture comprising an amount of an electrochemically active polycarbon-sulfide material effective to provide cathode activity, wherein said polycarbon-sulfide material in its oxidized state is of the general formula I ##STR7## wherein x ranges from greater than 2.5 to about 50, and n is greater than or equal to 2. 2. A method of forming a composite cathode which comprises: coating an electrically conducting cathode substrate with a mixture comprising an am
